name: Stuck in the Routine [LD47]
description:
Welcome to Stuck in the Routine! A LD47 game based on the theme Stuck in a loop.
Will you be able to overcome your routine?

This game is a kind of visual novel and Point&Click. You play has Jon, a office worker who is bored of his miserable life. One day, his life starts to change when a new coworker appears in the office.

How to play?

  • The game is sooooo buggy, but this is LD and we didn't have enough time. Report any bug and I will try to make a PostLD build a little bit fixed. :smile:
  • And some kind of minigames, where you have to do some office work, you only have to click on things that will become bigger.
  • The game is made of some dialogs (use mouse click to continue) .
  • (Yeah, we know this game is so simple, but we run out of time).

Controls:

  •  Simple, you only have to use the mouse.

Team:
 - UberElectron (It's me!) -> Main programer.
 - Alex11111 -> Music and Sound Desing.
 - AdrihLOL -> Background and vectorial desing.
 - Nokuga -> Character desing.
 - Depresed_zoomer -> Story.
 - KbroXino -> Moral support.
